question_stem.en: The aim of a prospective cohort study conducted in a group of adults with diagnosed type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) is to investigate the association between the presence of morbid obesity (BMI >40 kg/m²) and the risk of developing diabetic nephropathy. One of the groups in the study consists of adults with T2DM, a BMI >40 kg/m², and no diabetic nephropathy.
question_stem.zh: 一项针对一组已确诊2型糖尿病（T2DM）成年人的前瞻性队列研究，旨在调查病态肥胖（BMI >40 kg/m²）与发生糖尿病肾病的风险之间的关联。研究组之一包括T2DM患者、BMI >40 kg/m²且无糖尿病肾病的成年人。

question.en: Which of the following is the most appropriate comparison group for this prospective cohort study?
question.zh: 以下哪一项是该前瞻性队列研究最合适的对照组？

A.en: Adults with T2DM who have morbid obesity (BMI >40 kg/m²) and diabetic nephropathy
A.zh: 患有T2DM且患有病态肥胖（BMI >40 kg/m²）和糖尿病肾病的成年人

B.en: Adults with T2DM who have normal weight (BMI 18.5 to <25 kg/m²) and diabetic nephropathy
B.zh: 患有T2DM且体重正常（BMI 18.5至<25 kg/m²）和糖尿病肾病的成年人

C.en: Adults with T2DM who have normal weight (BMI 18.5 to <25 kg/m²) and no diabetic nephropathy
C.zh: 患有T2DM且体重正常（BMI 18.5至<25 kg/m²）且无糖尿病肾病的成年人

D.en: Adults without T2DM who have morbid obesity (BMI >40 kg/m²) and no diabetic nephropathy
D.zh: 未患T2DM且患有病态肥胖（BMI >40 kg/m²）且无糖尿病肾病的成年人

E.en: Adults without T2DM who have normal weight (BMI 18.5 to <25 kg/m²) and diabetic nephropathy
E.zh: 未患T2DM且体重正常（BMI 18.5至<25 kg/m²）和糖尿病肾病的成年人

explanation.en: The population of interest is patients with TYPE 2 DIABETES MELLITUS (T2DM). The risk factor of interest is MORBID OBESITY (BMI >40 kg/m²). The outcome of interest is DIABETIC NEPHROPATHY. The exposed group is adults with T2DM who have morbid obesity and no diabetic nephropathy; the nonexposed group is adults with T2DM who have normal weight (BMI 18.5 to <25 kg/m²) and no diabetic nephropathy.
explanation.zh: 感兴趣的人群是2型糖尿病（T2DM）患者。感兴趣的风险因素是病态肥胖（BMI >40 kg/m²）。感兴趣的结局是糖尿病肾病。暴露组是患有T2DM且患有病态肥胖且无糖尿病肾病的成年人；非暴露组是患有T2DM且体重正常（BMI 18.5至<25 kg/m²）且无糖尿病肾病的成年人。

summary.en: 1) Cohort study design 2) In a cohort study, subjects should be initially selected from the population of interest (eg, T2DM) based on their exposure status to a risk factor (eg, presence or absence of morbid obesity). Subjects are then monitored during the study period for development of the outcome of interest (eg, diabetic nephropathy).
summary.zh: 1) 队列研究设计 2) 在队列研究中，应首先根据受试者对风险因素的暴露状态（例如，是否存在病态肥胖）从感兴趣的人群（例如，T2DM）中选择受试者。然后在研究期间监测受试者是否发展出感兴趣的结局（例如，糖尿病肾病）。
